alert.note: Alert for Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Johnson County, Casper BLM; Natrona County, Casper BLM (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 13 at 11:21AM MDT until September 13 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Unseasonably Warm Temperatures...and Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY Fire Zones...280...289. In North Central WY Fire Zone....281. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont...Natrona. In North Central WY...Johnson. In Southwest WY...Sweetwater. * WIND: South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 11 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the lower to middle 80s; highs in the middle to upper 70s in Casper Mountain and the Green Mountains.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Johnson County, Casper BLM; Natrona County, Casper BLM
